title: Cyrus
author: Cyrus
created_time: August 24, 2023, 02:44:00 PMLast edit: November 03, 2023, 01:10:37 AM by Cyrus
content: Today we're pleased to announce the limited edition of the Open Mic Forum art print. You might remember seeing it as part of our sponsorship towards the prizes of Bitcointalk Community Awards 2022, details here.This artwork is also featured in the latest BitcoinTalkShow video which you can watch here: https://youtu.be/ZSKimRE6qmYLimited edition of 12 prints, 9 are available for sale now in this thread.Click the photos for higher resolution.To quote from the reference thread:"The original piece was commissioned by us from likehiro of Hard Fork Studio, which you might remember from his awesome entry in the 10th anniversary art contest." "The Bitcointalk forum, as Bitcoin itself, is a very open place where each of us has a voice. the Open Mic Forum is a visual representation example of that statement."Each art print is numbered, has a tamper proof hologram and comes with CoA and other goodies.DetailsItem for Sale: 9 Open Mic Forum art prints, numbered #2 to #10.Material: Giclée fine art print on Hahnemuehle PhotoRag Bright White, 310 gsm.Size: 60cm/24'' wide, unframed.Price: $120 + shipping. Address will be sent via PM. Watch out for impersonators!Shipping From Europe, in special tubes. Price based on location and preference.Numbers available:1 - Reserved2 - Sold3 - Available4 - Available5 - Available6 - Available7 - Available8 - Available9 - Available10 - Available11 - Reserved12 - Reserved

comments.author: BtcTalkShow
comments.created_time: September 11, 2023, 02:34:43 PMLast edit: September 11, 2023, 03:23:29 PM by BtcTalkShow
comments.body: Bump! This print was featured in the latest BitcoinTalkShow episode.Proceeds will go towards funding future BitcoinTalkshow episodes.

comments.author: mx12.levins
comments.body: I could take this one with me to the London summit next year. Please reserve number 2 for me.

comments.author: Cyrus
comments.body: That would be really cool, thank you mx12.levins!
